document_data.name: Leather strop
document_data.mainbody: A '''leather strop''' was a simple tool used to maintain small blades.
document_data.Usage: A strop was used to polish and sharpen [[knives]], [[razor]]s, [[dagger]]s, and other small blades. Because of its cheapness and small size, a strop was a useful and common piece of equipment for armed travelers to carry. It performed a similar role to a [[whetstone]], which was generally used for larger blades.
document_data.Availability: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold handy leather strops for 2 [[cp]] each.
